mapper.insert: insert into APP_CUS_ADDRESS (ID, MEMBER_ID, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, STREET, IS_DEFAULT, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update APP_CUS_ADDRESS set MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STREET = #{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_DEFAULT = #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY_NAME = #{countyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, MEMBER_ID, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, STREET, IS_DEFAULT, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE from APP_CUS_ADDRESS where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, MEMBER_ID, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, STREET, IS_DEFAULT, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_NAME, COUNTY_NAME, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE from APP_CUS_ADDRESS
